original: des na don la tha dad med //
analyzed: des na don la tha dad med //
translated: Therefore, in reality, there is no difference.

original: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag tu //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan dag tu //
translated: In terms of self and others,

original: mnyam pa nyid du khyed kyis bzhed //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du khyed kyis bzhed //
translated: you assert equality.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'phrog pa ni phyir khyer ba'o //
analyzed: 'phrog pa ni phyir khyer ba'o //
translated: “To take away” means to carry away.🔽Craving exists, you think?

original: re zhig sred pa ni yod pa nyid do snyam pa la /🔽de nyid du @157a * //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: re zhig sred pa ni yod pa nyid do snyam pa la / de nyid du @157a * // zhes smos te /
translated: “In reality” is stated.

original: nam yang mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nam yang mi 'byung ngo //
translated: It never occurs.

original: gson pa'i 'jig rten ni sems can no //
analyzed: gson pa'i 'jig rten ni sems can no //
translated: The world of the living is sentient beings.

original: mkha' zhes pa ni brtags pas ston pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: mkha' zhes pa ni brtags pas ston pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra'o //
translated: “Space” is like space because it is taught through imputation.

original: bdag bzhin zhes pa ni bdag dang 'dra bar bden pa mthong ba'o //
analyzed: bdag bzhin zhes pa ni bdag dang 'dra bar bden pa mthong ba'o //
translated: “Like the self” means seeing the truth like the self.

original: 'di ltar gang 'thab pa dang spro ba'i rgyu dag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pas sems dkrugs pa'i byis pa rnams phyir zhing 'khrug par byed pa'i 'khrug pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang 'thab pa dang spro ba'i rgyu dag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pas sems dkrugs pa'i byis pa rnams phyir zhing 'khrug par byed pa'i 'khrug pa'o //
translated: Thus, the childish, whose minds are disturbed by false imagination due to the causes of fighting and delight, are agitated again and again by agitation.

original: dga' bar 'gyur ba ni dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: dga' bar 'gyur ba ni dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: “To delight” means to delight.

original: nyon mongs pa ni sems khral te brang brdung ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni sems khral te brang brdung ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Affliction is mental distress, such as beating the chest and so on.

original: 'tshe ba zhes pa ni yid mi bde ba'o //
analyzed: 'tshe ba zhes pa ni yid mi bde ba'o //
translated: “Pain” is mental suffering.

original: mi rang 'tshong ba ni 'tshong ba'i phyir nyams par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mi rang 'tshong ba ni 'tshong ba'i phyir nyams par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Selling oneself” is being ruined for the sake of profit.

original: sdig pa ste mi dge ba'i chos kyis so //
analyzed: sdig pa ste mi dge ba'i chos kyis so //
translated: “Sinful” means by nonvirtuous dharmas.

original: de nas shi nas ngan 'gror ltung ba ni dmyal ba la sogs par ro //
analyzed: de nas shi nas ngan 'gror ltung ba ni dmyal ba la sogs par ro //
translated: “Then, after death, falling into the lower realms” means into the hells and so on.

original: yun ring zhes bya ba ni dus ring du 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: yun ring zhes bya ba ni dus ring du 'byung ba'o //
translated: “For a long time” means for a long period.

original: mi bzad ces pa ni bsran dka' ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'o //
analyzed: mi bzad ces pa ni bsran dka' ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'o //
translated: “Unbearable” means being oppressed by difficult-to-endure suffering.

original: yang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: yang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Next, in order to teach the transmission of the suffering of sentient beings from one to another,

original: srid pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: srid pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it says “existence” and so on.

original: g-yang sa ni ya nga ba'i sa'o //
analyzed: g-yang sa ni ya nga ba'i sa'o //
translated: “Abyss” is a frightening place.

original: de ni ste srid par ro //
analyzed: de ni ste srid par ro //
translated: “That” is existence.

original: de nyid min zhes pa ni rnam par rmongs pas dkrugs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid min zhes pa ni rnam par rmongs pas dkrugs pa nyid do //
translated: “Not that” is being disturbed by confusion.

original: 'di 'dra zhes pa ni phan tshun 'gal bar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid de kho na nyid ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: 'di 'dra zhes pa ni phan tshun 'gal bar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid de kho na nyid ma yin pa ste /
translated: “Like this” is the characteristic of mutually contradictory statements that are not reality.

original: don dam par yod pa'i dngos po ni gcig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par yod pa'i dngos po ni gcig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a thing that ultimately exists has the nature of being one.

original: bya ba zhes pa ni 'tsho ba'i don gyi bya ba khrus dang / bsku byug pa la sogs pa dang / nad med par bya ba'i don du rtsub pa kha tan te za ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba zhes pa ni 'tsho ba'i don gyi bya ba khrus dang / bsku byug pa la sogs pa dang / nad med par bya ba'i don du rtsub pa kha tan te za ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Action refers to the action of living, such as bathing, anointing, and so on, and the action of being healthy, such as eating rough food and so on.

original: bkres pa ni ltogs pa'o //
analyzed: bkres pa ni ltogs pa'o //
translated: Hunger is starvation.

original: nad ni na ba'o //
analyzed: nad ni na ba'o //
translated: Sickness is disease.

original: ngal ba ni lam la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: ngal ba ni lam la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Fatigue is the affliction of the path and so on.

original: gnyid ni gnyid log pa'o //
analyzed: gnyid ni gnyid log pa'o //
translated: Sleep is sleep.

original: 'tshe ba ni tho 'tshams pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'tshe ba ni tho 'tshams pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Harm is violence and so on.

original: tshe 'dzin pa ni tshe sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: tshe 'dzin pa ni tshe sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: Maintaining life is prolonging life.

original: myur ba ni mgyogs pa'o //
analyzed: myur ba ni mgyogs pa'o //
translated: Swift is quick.

original: bden pa ni srid pa'i chags pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: bden pa ni srid pa'i chags pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: Truth is free from the attachment of existence.

original: de la'ang zhes pa ni bden pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la'ang zhes pa ni bden pa yin pa'o //
translated: And that refers to truth.

original: rnam par g-yengs pa ni rgod par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par g-yengs pa ni rgod par gyur pa'o //
translated: Distracted is becoming agitated.

original: ga la ste rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: ga la ste rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: Where is following?

original: deng na yang don med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: deng na yang don med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Even now, it would be meaningless.

original: ngan 'gro chen po ni mnar med pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ngan 'gro chen po ni mnar med pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The great evil destinies are the Avici hells, etc.

original: ltung bar byed pa ni ltung bar gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan no //
analyzed: ltung bar byed pa ni ltung bar gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan no //
translated: The cause of falling is the reason for falling.

original: @157b log pa'i lam ni bram ze la sogs pas bshad pa rnams so //
analyzed: @157b log pa'i lam ni bram ze la sogs pas bshad pa rnams so //
translated: The wrong paths are those taught by Brahmins, etc.

original: gso ba ste yang dag pa'i lam gyis kyang thub par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: gso ba ste yang dag pa'i lam gyis kyang thub par dka' ba'o //
translated: It is difficult to overcome even with the right path, the cure.🔽The leisure and opportunity are the difficult-to-find state free from the eight fetters.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!

original: dal 'byor te mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i gnas skabs rnyed par dka' ba'o //
analyzed: dal 'byor te mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par grol ba'i gnas skabs rnyed par dka' ba'o //
translated: is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.

original: ae ma'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ae ma'o zhes pa ni /
translated: The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!

original: skyo ba'o // sdug bsngal rnyed pa ni gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i dka' bla thob pa'o //
analyzed: skyo ba'o // sdug bsngal rnyed pa ni gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i dka' bla thob pa'o //
translated: is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.

original: kye ma kyi hud ces pa ni skyo nas ya mtshan du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: kye ma kyi hud ces pa ni skyo nas ya mtshan du gyur pa'o //
translated: The alas!

original: rab tu gdungs pa ni bcum par gyur pa'o //🔽mi mthong ba ni mi lta ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu gdungs pa ni bcum par gyur pa'o // mi mthong ba ni mi lta ba'o //
translated: is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!

original: gang zhes pa ni sems can no //
analyzed: gang zhes pa ni sems can no //
translated: is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!

original: tshul dang mthun pa'i dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshul dang mthun pa'i dpe bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.

original: dper na zhes smos te /
analyzed: dper na zhes smos te /
translated: The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.

original: khrus byas nas te /
analyzed: khrus byas nas te /
translated: The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain state.🔽The alas!🔽is the weariness. The attainment of suffering is the difficult-to-attain

original: khrus ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas grang bas nyen nas bde bar 'dod pas mer 'jug pa ni lus bsro ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: khrus ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas grang bas nyen nas bde bar 'dod pas mer 'jug pa ni lus bsro ba'i don du'o //
translated: Having bathed just as before, one enters the fire out of a desire for comfort, being tormented by the cold, for the sake of warming the body.

original: de ltar na ste brjod pa'i rim pa ltar na mi bde bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar na ste brjod pa'i rim pa ltar na mi bde bar gnas pa ste /
translated: Thus, in the order of expression, one abides in discomfort,

original: sdug bsngal gyi mes khyur mid byas pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi mes khyur mid byas pa'o //
translated: being swallowed up by the fire of suffering.

original: ae ma'o bdag nyid la yod par gyur pa'i bag med pa yang ma rig go zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ae ma'o bdag nyid la yod par gyur pa'i bag med pa yang ma rig go zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show that one should not be heedless with regard to oneself,

original: rga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “old age, etc. ”

original: 'chi ba ni shi nas rnam par shes pa 'pho ba ste da rung ma rig pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba ni shi nas rnam par shes pa 'pho ba ste da rung ma rig pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Death is the transference of consciousness after death, which is still ignorance.

original: rol pa ni gang de dag nyid kyi longs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rol pa ni gang de dag nyid kyi longs par byed pa'o //
translated: Play is that which enjoys just those.

original: 'jigs par byed pa ni sdug bsngal mi bzad par ster ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa ni sdug bsngal mi bzad par ster ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is frightening because it bestows unbearable suffering.

original: zhi ba ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: zhi ba ni bde ba'o //
translated: Peace is bliss.

original: byed pa ni spyod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa ni spyod par byed pa'o //
translated: Action is activity.

original: dmigs pa med par ni sbyin par bya ba dang ster ba'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa med par ni sbyin par bya ba dang ster ba'o //
translated: Without an object is the object of giving and the giver.

original: so sor 'dzin pa po ste gsum mi dmigs par gus pas bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa'o //
analyzed: so sor 'dzin pa po ste gsum mi dmigs par gus pas bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa'o //
translated: The accumulation of merit is respectfully made without observing the three: the one who gives, the one who receives, and the gift.

original: dmigs pas phung ba ni dmigs par lta bas phung ba ste /
analyzed: dmigs pas phung ba ni dmigs par lta bas phung ba ste /
translated: The ruin of observation is the ruin of observation by the view of observation.🔽When will they teach emptiness to those who

original: gang de dag rnams la nam gyi tshe stong pa nyid ston par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang de dag rnams la nam gyi tshe stong pa nyid ston par 'gyur zhes bya ba ste /
translated: are ruined by the view of observation?

original: gzhan du na bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan du na bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it cannot be taught otherwise.

original: kun rdzob tu tha snyad tsam du'o //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu tha snyad tsam du'o //
translated: [It is taught] conventionally, as a mere convention.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las le'u dgu pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las le'u dgu pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
translated: This is the commentary on the ninth chapter, having twelve verses, called “the perfection of wisdom.🔽”

original: // / da ni yongs su bsngo ba bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: // / da ni yongs su bsngo ba bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: Now, in order to teach the dedication, [the text] says:🔽“In the conduct of enlightenment,

original: bdag gis byang chub spyod pa la //
analyzed: bdag gis byang chub spyod pa la //
translated: I have contemplated, rejoiced,🔽and dedicated the virtue

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: of myself and others🔽to the unsurpassed enlightenment.”

original: rnam par bsams pa ni rnam par dpyad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par bsams pa ni rnam par dpyad pa'o //
translated: Contemplated means analyzed.

original: dga' ba ni yi rang ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni yi rang ba'o //
translated: Rejoiced means delighted.

original: nyams pa ste bri bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nyams pa ste bri bar ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: May it not diminish, that is, may it not decrease, is the meaning.

original: rgyun mi chad pa ste rtag tu'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi chad pa ste rtag tu'o //
translated: Uninterrupted means constantly.

original: de ltar spyir brjod nas bye brag tu brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar spyir brjod nas bye brag tu brjod par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having thus stated the general, in order to state the particular,

original: 'jig rten zhes @158a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten zhes @158a * //
translated: he says, “world.”

original: smos te ; de la tsha ba'i dmyal ba chen po brgyad ni yang sos dang / thig nag dang / du 'bod chen po dang / du 'bod dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / tsha ba dang / bsdus 'joms dang / mnar med pa rnams so //
analyzed: smos te ; de la tsha ba'i dmyal ba chen po brgyad ni yang sos dang / thig nag dang / du 'bod chen po dang / du 'bod dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / tsha ba dang / bsdus 'joms dang / mnar med pa rnams so //
translated: Therein, the eight great hot hells are: Reviving, Black-Lined, Great Howling, Howling, Heating, Intense Heating, Crushing, and Unrelenting Pain.

original: grang ba'i dmyal ba chen po brgyad ni /
analyzed: grang ba'i dmyal ba chen po brgyad ni /
translated: The eight great cold hells are:

original: so thams thams pa dang ; kyi hud dang / aa chu zer ba dang / chu bur rdol ba dang / chu bur can dang / autpala ltar gas pa dang / padma ltar gas pa dang / padma ltar gas pa chen po rnams so //
analyzed: so thams thams pa dang ; kyi hud dang / aa chu zer ba dang / chu bur rdol ba dang / chu bur can dang / autpala ltar gas pa dang / padma ltar gas pa dang / padma ltar gas pa chen po rnams so //
translated: Splitting Open Like a Lotus, Splitting Open Like a Lotus Flower, Splitting Open Like a Lotus Bud, Splitting Open Like a Lotus, Splitting Open Like a Lotus Flower, Splitting Open Like a Lotus Bud, Splitting Open Like a Lotus, and Splitting Open Like a Lotus Flower.

original: bde ba can zhes pa ni sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhing khams te /
analyzed: bde ba can zhes pa ni sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa'i zhing khams te /
translated: “The Land of Bliss” is the realm of the Buddha Amitābha.

original: de'i bde bas dga' bar shog shig pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bde bas dga' bar shog shig pa'o //
translated: May they delight in its bliss.

original: mtsho yas zhes pa ni 'dus pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: mtsho yas zhes pa ni 'dus pa'i tshogs so //
translated: “The lake” is the assembly of the gathered ones.

original: nye ba'i dmyal ba bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: nye ba'i dmyal ba bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the neighboring hells,🔽he says,

original: ral gri zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ral gri zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The forest of sword leaves, etc.

original: ral gri'i rnam pa lta bu'i lo 'dab dang gang ldan pa'i gnas de ral gri'i lo ma nags tshal lo //
analyzed: ral gri'i rnam pa lta bu'i lo 'dab dang gang ldan pa'i gnas de ral gri'i lo ma nags tshal lo //
translated: The forest of sword leaves is the place that has leaves like the shape of a sword.

original: dga' tshal ni brgya byin gyi skyed mos tshal lo //
analyzed: dga' tshal ni brgya byin gyi skyed mos tshal lo //
translated: The pleasure grove is Indra's garden.

original: de nyid sdu gu ste bde ba ster byed do //
analyzed: de nyid sdu gu ste bde ba ster byed do //
translated: It is delightful, giving pleasure.

original: gang gzhan gyi bud med yid la byas pa tsam gyis mkho dgur ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod ldan ma rab tu snang bas na sprul pa ste /
analyzed: gang gzhan gyi bud med yid la byas pa tsam gyis mkho dgur ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod ldan ma rab tu snang bas na sprul pa ste /
translated: The emanation is the one who appears as a desirable woman endowed with all that is necessary, just by the mere attention of another.

original: shal ma ri'i sdong po yang de'o //
analyzed: shal ma ri'i sdong po yang de'o //
translated: The śālmali tree is also that.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing ni dpag bsam gyi sdong po'o //
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing ni dpag bsam gyi sdong po'o //
translated: The wish-fulfilling tree is the wish-fulfilling tree.

original: 'khrung bar shog shig ces pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrung bar shog shig ces pa'o //
translated: May they be born.

original: che ldan zhes pa ni chad pa med par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: che ldan zhes pa ni chad pa med par ldan pa'o //
translated: Endowed with greatness means endowed without interruption.

original: nyams dga' ba ni snying dga' ba'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba ni snying dga' ba'o //
translated: Delightful means delightful to the heart.

original: sol phung ni me mar mur gyi'o //
analyzed: sol phung ni me mar mur gyi'o //
translated: The burning embers are those of a fire.

original: rin chen ni bee d'ur+ya la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen ni bee d'ur+ya la sogs pa'o //
translated: The jewels are beryl and so on.

original: sa bsregs ni lcags kyi rang bzhin du 'bar ba can gyi dmyal ba'i sa gzhi'o //
analyzed: sa bsregs ni lcags kyi rang bzhin du 'bar ba can gyi dmyal ba'i sa gzhi'o //
translated: The burning ground is the ground of the hells, blazing with iron.

original: shel gyis gzhi bstar ba zhes bya ba ni shel las byung zhing des brtsams pa'i sa gzhi'o //
analyzed: shel gyis gzhi bstar ba zhes bya ba ni shel las byung zhing des brtsams pa'i sa gzhi'o //
translated: The crystal ground is the ground of the hells, made of crystal.

original: bsdus 'joms ri bo ni ri lug gi rnam pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bsdus 'joms ri bo ni ri lug gi rnam pa lta bu'o //
translated: The mountain of crushing is a mountain shaped like a sheep.

original: gzhal med khang ni lha'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
analyzed: gzhal med khang ni lha'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
translated: The celestial palace is the palace of the gods.

original: chu bo rab med ni dmyal ba'i chu bo'o //
analyzed: chu bo rab med ni dmyal ba'i chu bo'o //
translated: The river without ford is the river of the hells.

original: me ni sreg par byed pa'o //
analyzed: me ni sreg par byed pa'o //
translated: Fire is that which burns.

original: 'dra ba ni de dang mtshungs pa'i chu gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba ni de dang mtshungs pa'i chu gang yin pa'o //
translated: The lake is that which is similar to it.

original: bying ba ni gting du nub pa'o //
analyzed: bying ba ni gting du nub pa'o //
translated: Sinking is submerging.

original: zhig pa ni zhig cing 'brul ba'o //
analyzed: zhig pa ni zhig cing 'brul ba'o //
translated: Destruction is the destruction and disintegration of the body.

original: lus thob pa ni bdag gi dngos pos so //
analyzed: lus thob pa ni bdag gi dngos pos so //
translated: Obtaining a body is by means of one's own entity.

original: bde bas mngon par dga' ba ni bde dga'o //
analyzed: bde bas mngon par dga' ba ni bde dga'o //
translated: Delight in pleasure is the joy of pleasure.

original: me tog ni padma'o //
analyzed: me tog ni padma'o //
translated: Flowers are lotuses.

original: char pa ni 'bab pa'i rgyun no //
analyzed: char pa ni 'bab pa'i rgyun no //
translated: Rain is the falling stream.

original: 'bab pa ni rab tu 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: 'bab pa ni rab tu 'bab pa'o //
translated: Falling is falling down.

original: phyag na padma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
analyzed: phyag na padma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
translated: Padmapāṇi is Lokeśvara.

original: sdug bsngal ni sdug cing bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ni sdug cing bsngal ba'o //
translated: Suffering is suffering and pain.

original: @158b shugs ni rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyun no //
analyzed: @158b shugs ni rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyun no //
translated: The current is the flow of the river.

original: grogs ni grogs dag go //
analyzed: grogs ni grogs dag go //
translated: The companions are the friends.

original: brlan pa ni bangs pa'o //
analyzed: brlan pa ni bangs pa'o //
translated: The moisture is the water.

original: spos dris gang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spos dris gang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: The palace filled with the fragrance of incense is mentioned by its characteristics.

original: sgrib pa med ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'am yang na mngon sum mo //
analyzed: sgrib pa med ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral ba'am yang na mngon sum mo //
translated: The absence of obscurations is the freedom from the afflictive and knowledge obscurations, or else it is direct perception.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sprin dang 'dra bas na sprin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sprin dang 'dra bas na sprin no //
translated: The assembly of bodhisattvas is like a cloud, thus it is a cloud.

original: bde ba ni dal gyis 'bab pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni dal gyis 'bab pa'o //
translated: Happiness is the gentle flow.

original: tshim pa ni zas skom gyis so //
analyzed: tshim pa ni zas skom gyis so //
translated: Satisfaction is by food and drink.

original: khrus byas ni 'o rgyun gyis so //
analyzed: khrus byas ni 'o rgyun gyis so //
translated: Having bathed is by the stream.

original: lha mo sgyu 'phrul ni ston pa skyed byed ma'o //
analyzed: lha mo sgyu 'phrul ni ston pa skyed byed ma'o //
translated: The goddess Māyā is the teacher, the one who gives birth.

original: bstan pa ni rtsom pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa ni rtsom pa'o //
translated: The teaching is the composition.

original: thar par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sems can zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: thar par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sems can zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Liberation is for sentient beings, which is the remainder of the sentence.

original: bde ba ni bkra shis par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba ni bkra shis par byed pa'o //
translated: Happiness is the auspiciousness.

original: 'bad mi dgos pa ni thabs la mkhas pas so //
analyzed: 'bad mi dgos pa ni thabs la mkhas pas so //
translated: Without effort is by skillful means.

original: gru chen ni gzings so //
analyzed: gru chen ni gzings so //
translated: The great ship is a boat.

original: nyam nga ni bgrod dka' ba'o //
analyzed: nyam nga ni bgrod dka' ba'o //
translated: Fear means difficult to traverse.

original: myos pa ni smyon pa'o //
analyzed: myos pa ni smyon pa'o //
translated: Intoxicated means insane.

original: rab myos ni dpag med pas myos pa'o //
analyzed: rab myos ni dpag med pas myos pa'o //
translated: Utterly intoxicated means intoxicated by the immeasurable.

original: rtag tu zhes pa ni dus kyi mthar brjod pa'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa ni dus kyi mthar brjod pa'o //
translated: Always means at the end of time.

original: mdzod ni nam mkha' nyid do //
analyzed: mdzod ni nam mkha' nyid do //
translated: The treasury is the sky itself.

original: de dang gang 'dra ba ni mdzod bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de dang gang 'dra ba ni mdzod bzhin du zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is like that is called like a treasury.

original: rtsod pa ni 'thab pa'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa ni 'thab pa'o //
translated: Conflict means fighting.

original: phongs pa ni nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: phongs pa ni nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Distress means affliction.

original: gzi brjid ni nus pa'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid ni nus pa'o //
translated: Splendor means ability.

original: dka' thub ni nyon mongs pa'o //
analyzed: dka' thub ni nyon mongs pa'o //
translated: Asceticism means affliction.

original: mtho ba ni nor la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtho ba ni nor la sogs pa'o //
translated: High means wealth and so forth.

original: 'od zer zhes bya ba ni nyi zer la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer zhes bya ba ni nyi zer la sogs pa'o //
translated: Rays means the sun's rays and so forth.

original: mthu dang ldan pa ni nus pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: mthu dang ldan pa ni nus pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: Powerful means perfect ability.

original: nad pa ni nad yang dag par skyes pa'o //
analyzed: nad pa ni nad yang dag par skyes pa'o //
translated: Sick means fully arisen illness.

original: rgyas pa ni gang ba'o //
analyzed: rgyas pa ni gang ba'o //
translated: Full means filled.

original: mthun pa ni bsam pa gcig pa'o //
analyzed: mthun pa ni bsam pa gcig pa'o //
translated: In agreement means of one intention.

original: las su rung ba ni le lo med pa'o //
analyzed: las su rung ba ni le lo med pa'o //
translated: Workable means without laziness.

original: bde ba dang ldan zhes pa ni nges par gzung ba ste /
analyzed: bde ba dang ldan zhes pa ni nges par gzung ba ste /
translated: Endowed with bliss is a specification.

original: de dag ces bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de dag ces bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Those is a remainder of the words.

original: sdug pa ni gnas skabs na yang nyams dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: sdug pa ni gnas skabs na yang nyams dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The pleasant is that which is endowed with excellence even in the present.

original: lus po zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: lus po zhes bya ba tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The body is the remainder of the sentence.

original: dben pa'i don du gnas pa ni dben pa na gnas pa'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i don du gnas pa ni dben pa na gnas pa'o //
translated: Dwelling in solitude is dwelling in a solitary place.

original: de'i phun sum ldan pa ni rjes su mthun par tshogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phun sum ldan pa ni rjes su mthun par tshogs pa nyid do //
translated: The excellence of that is the very assembly that is in harmony.

original: smin gyur cig ni 'bras bu smin par gyur cig pa'o //
analyzed: smin gyur cig ni 'bras bu smin par gyur cig pa'o //
translated: May it ripen is may the fruit ripen.

original: bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bka' de ston par byed pa'i gtsug lag la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: bstan pa ni rgyal ba'i bka' de ston par byed pa'i gtsug lag la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: The teaching is also the scriptures, etc. that teach that word of the Victor.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni bla ma'o //🔽byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni bla ma'o // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las /
translated: The spiritual friend is the guru.

original: le'u bcu pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
analyzed: le'u bcu pa'i dka' 'grel lo /
translated: This is the commentary on the tenth chapter, having ten verses, called “the virtues of the master of the house.🔽”

original: // / dge slong bee ro tsa na yis //🔽byang chub spyod pa la 'jug pa //
analyzed: // / dge slong bee ro tsa na yis // byang chub spyod pa la 'jug pa //
translated: The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house

original: @159a * // phyogs tsam bkrol las dge ba gang //🔽thob des 'gro rnams rgyal bar shog / nub phyogs rgyud du 'gro snyam pa yi bsam pas bdag gis 'grel pa 'di brtsams te //
analyzed: @159a * // phyogs tsam bkrol las dge ba gang //🔽thob des 'gro rnams rgyal bar shog / nub phyogs rgyud du 'gro snyam pa yi bsam pas bdag gis 'grel pa 'di brtsams te //
translated: The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house🔽The virtues of the master of the house

original: de na rtsa ba rkyang ba 'ang yod dam med snyam bdag ni the tshom gyur ba na //🔽lta smos ci dgos 'grel pa med snyam des na nga rgyal sgo nas byas so zhes //
analyzed: de na rtsa ba rkyang ba 'ang yod dam med snyam bdag ni the tshom gyur ba na // lta smos ci dgos 'grel pa med snyam des na nga rgyal sgo nas byas so zhes //
translated: I thought, “Are there any independent root texts or not?”🔽I thought, “If there are no commentaries, what need is there to mention [the root text]? ” Thus, I composed [this commentary] out of pride.🔽Those with pure minds, do not think that I had such an intention.

original: thugs dgongs ma mdzad dag pa'i blo can rnams kyis gzhan dag ci dgar sems la rag / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i dka' 'grel /
analyzed: thugs dgongs ma mdzad dag pa'i blo can rnams kyis gzhan dag ci dgar sems la rag / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i dka' 'grel /
translated: The commentary on the Bodhicaryâvatâra🔽is completed.🔽It was composed by the great scholar, the monk Vairocanarakṣita,

original: dpal b'i kra ma la sh'i la'i gtsug lag khang gi mkhas pa chen po dge slong bee ro tsa na rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal b'i kra ma la sh'i la'i gtsug lag khang gi mkhas pa chen po dge slong bee ro tsa na rakshi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: at the temple of Vikramaśīla.
